thread.title: BRIEF-Twenty-First Century Fox Notes Announcement By UK Takeover Panel Regarding Disney Offer For Sky

title: BRIEF-Twenty-First Century Fox Notes Announcement By UK Takeover Panel Regarding Disney Offer For Sky

organizations.name: panel regarding disney offer for sky reuters staff

text:
April 12, 2018 / 1:59 PM / in 15 minutes BRIEF-Twenty-First Century Fox Notes Announcement By UK Takeover Panel Regarding Disney Offer For Sky Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 12 (Reuters) - Twenty-First Century Fox Inc : 
* NOTES ANNOUNCEMENT TODAY BY TAKEOVER PANEL REGARDING REQUIREMENT FOR WALT DISNEY COMPANY (DISNEY) TO MAKE A MANDATORY OFFER 
* REMAINS COMMITTED TO ITS RECOMMENDED CASH OFFER FOR SKY ANNOUNCED ON 15TH DECEMBER 2016 Source text for Eikon:
